title: Choppy Locked Screen
body: I have a problem with my screen. While its locked it doesn't keep up with my character and keep jittering, since I've only ever played locked this makes it unplayable for me, please help. My FPS and Ping are fine and I've tried capping my FPS lower and everything.. Please help. I can only play locked so this makes League unplayable.

replies.body:
This could be related to a background application trying to create an overlay or manage your display settings. I'd recommend [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this helped.

Shoot! :(

I'd recommend running a set of system logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach the zipped log folder to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with context on your issue. One of our techs will be able to dive into those logs and help you identify the exact cause of this issue.
